resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103575</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103575</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085940</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Instructional goals and classroom space</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisende Ziele und Klassenzimmerplatz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Buts et espace d'instruction de salle de classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Objetivos e espaço instrutivos da sala de aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Obiettivi e spazio didattici dell'aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκπαιδευτικοί στόχοι και διάστημα τάξεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Metas y espacio educacionales de la sala de clase</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Your classroom should be arranged to help you meet your pedagogical goals. Any setting, including your classroom, exerts many influences -- frequently subtle -- on the people in it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ihr Klassenzimmer sollte geordnet werden, um Ihnen
zu helfen, Ihre pädagogischen Ziele zu treffen. Irgendeine 
Einstellung, einschließlich Ihr Klassenzimmer, wendet viele 
Einflüsse -- häufig subtil -- auf die Leute in ihr an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Votre salle de classe devrait être arrangée pour
vous aider à rencontrer vos buts pédagogiques. N'importe 
quelle configuration, y compris votre salle de classe, exerce beaucoup
d'influences -- fréquemment subtiles -- sur les personnes dans elle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sua sala de aula deve ser arranjada para 
ajudar-lhe encontrar-se com seus objetivos pedagogical. Qualquer
ajuste, including sua sala de aula, exerce muitas influências -- 
freqüentemente subtle -- nos povos nele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La vostra aula dovrebbe essere organizzata per 
aiutarli a venire a contatto dei vostri obiettivi pedagogici. 
Qualunque regolazione, compreso la vostra aula, impiega molte 
influenze -- frequentemente sottili -- sulla gente in esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τάξη σας πρέπει να κανονιστεί για να σας βοηθήσει να
συναντήσετε τους παιδαγωγικούς στόχους σας. Οποιαδήποτε 
τιμή τών παραμέτρων, συμπεριλαμβανομένης της τάξης σας, ασκεί 
πολλές επιρροές -- συχνά λεπτές -- στους ανθρώπους σε το.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Su sala de clase se debe arreglar para ayudarle a 
resolver sus metas pedagógicas. Cualquier configuración, 
incluyendo su sala de clase, ejerce muchas influencias -- con 
frecuencia sutiles -- en la gente en ella.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085940</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103575</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/instructional-goals-and-classroom-space</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
